heading: TOOLS HOUSE
subtitle: Manufacturing Tools Supplier
detail: Home page with interactive hero section and product section, combo offer section, high-performing business summary, and a high-volume customer review. Create a complex admin system, admin can be distributed admin access with other well-tested users. This website has some other maintainable features are added products and management. inventory, product updates, and deleting.
technology: HTML, Tailwind Css, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase,Heroku, React Query

heading: F2C STORE
subtitle: Grocery Supplier
detail: F2C has a home component, users can register by clicking the join now button. There has a managed inventory page, add item page has product add facilities, and my item page contains all cart items. This website has a maintainable login system. Users can log in by email and password or direct log in by Gmail.
technology: HTML, Tailwind Css, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase,Heroku, React Query

heading: SAILING NOW
subtitle: Boat Sailing Championship
detail: Single landing page, there has a news route to publish moment news Users can see all open events and can book a seat. The dashboard is privet, it contains some routes analysis, my booking, creating events, uploading images, managing user, and about us.
technology: HTML, CSS, Tailwind Css, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, Mongodb,Firebase,Heroku

heading: SNOW FUN
subtitle: ENJOY YOUR WINTER
detail: This website is skateboard-related. Winter season you can enjoy skating. This is only a front-end design. There has a home page that includes a hero section, customer review, and footer.There has a dashboard and a blog route and an about the route

heading: Mr.Career
subtitle: Build you Career
detail: This website is career build-up agency-related. There is a service section, and satisfied customer reviews.There also has clients and blogs route.
